content:
Yes, here are some recommended campsites in Corsica that have good facilities for families and kids:

1. Camping Arinella Bianca: located in northern Corsica, this campsite has direct access to a sandy beach and offers a large swimming pool, water park, kids' club, playground, and sports activities for all ages. 2. Camping Perla di Mare: located in southern Corsica, this campsite is situated right on the beach and offers swimming pools, water slides, kids' club, mini-golf, tennis, and many more family-friendly activities. 3. Camping La Pinède: located in western Corsica, this campsite is surrounded by a pine forest and offers numerous sports activities, including tennis, volleyball, petanque, and archery. It also has a kids' club, playground, and a large swimming pool. 4. Camping U Livanti: located near Porto-Vecchio on the east coast of Corsica, this campsite is situated right on the beach and offers spacious pitches, a water park, playground, mini-golf, and many activities for families and kids. 5. Camping Les Castors: located in the south of Corsica, this campsite is ideal for families with young children, as it offers a secure and spacious play area, kids' club, mini-farm, and a pool with children's area.
